review: I need to talk to someone ASAP about my remote , it's not working at all, I changed the batteries an tested it out and it still won't work. Seller please contact me soon .!!!!!
author: Jerhany

review: I had been using my blue ray player to watch my prime movies & shows, & also my Netflix shows, but I couldn't access my prime music. The Fire Stick was so easy to set up, & it simplified the process of accessing Prime shows & Netflix. I can also access Prime music, & even buy music & movies with it. It was a really good deal for just 35 bucks. Only regret is not doing it sooner.
author: Stan

review: Love Love Love it easy to use and wonderful to have!
author: Nancy

review: I installed this today on my not smart tv -- and voila -- movies, tv shows, etc -- all for $34.99 (on sale).  Easy to install for a non-techie -- easy to use.  It comes with a tiny remote -- few buttons and easy to use.  I then installed the free app on my iphone and can now use that as a voice controlled remote.  So simple, so easy, so inexpensive.  Made my day!
author: Big Suze

review: Love it..thinking about second one for travel.
author: Marsha S Banks
